lp.desktop.1st.title: Join “{{placeName}}”
lp.desktop.1st.description.newBlog: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out their blog on the go and stay updated with new posts.
lp.desktop.1st.description.stores: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to browse and buy from their store on the go and stay updated with the latest news & offers.
lp.desktop.1st.description.forum: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out their forum on the go and stay updated with new posts & discussions.
lp.desktop.1st.description.groups: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out their groups on the go and stay updated with the latest news & discussions.
lp.desktop.1st.description.bookings: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out and book their services on the go and stay updated with the latest news & updates.
lp.desktop.1st.description.events: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out their events on the go and stay updated with the latest news and discussions.
lp.desktop.1st.description.achievements: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out and participate in their programs and stay updated with the latest news.
lp.desktop.1st.description.default: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out their site on the go and stay updated with the latest news, offers and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.newBlog: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to read ‘{{itemName}}’. You’ll also be able to leave comments, get notified about new posts and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.stores: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out ‘{{itemName}}’. You’ll also be able to buy more products, stay updated about offers and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.forum: Download the {{appDescription}} and join “{{placeName}}”to check out ‘{{itemName}}’. You’ll also be able to leave comments, join in discussions, stay updated about new posts and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.groups: Download the {{appDescription}} and join “{{placeName}}” to become a member of ‘{{itemName}}’,  You’ll also be able to connect with other members, stay updated with group discussions and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.bookings: Download the {{appDescription}} and join “{{placeName}}” to book ‘{{itemName}}’.  You’ll also be able to check out other services, stay updated with news and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.events: Download the {{appDescription}} and join “{{placeName}}” to RSVP to ‘{{itemName}}’. You’ll also be able to check out other events, stay updated with news and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.achievements: Download the {{appDescription}} and join “{{placeName}}” to participate in ‘{{itemName}}’. You’ll also be able to check out other programs, stay updated with news and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.eventsSchedul: Join {{placeName}} on the {{appDescription}} app. Check out the schedule, build your personal agenda and keep updated on the day of the event.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.sharedGallery:
Download the {{appDescription}} app to become a member of “{{placeName}}” and open the ‘{{itemName}}’ album.
Stay updated with the latest photos & videos, see tags, add reactions comment and more.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.groupsPost: To view this post, become a member of “{{placeName}}” on the {{appDescription}} app.
lp.desktop.2nd.description.default: Download the {{appDescription}} app and join “{{placeName}}” to check out ‘{{itemName}}’.
lp.desktop.button.learn-more: Learn more about Spaces By Wix
lp.desktop.title.phone: Enter your phone number to get a download link
